title: Resolution Problem
body:
Since i bought my Asus Rog G752VL i've had some trouble with league. I'm playing in the borderless window mode. But each time there is a patch my resolution would bug out. I can see it in loading screen and in the game. The league screen would be either a bit too big all around my screen or too big bottom right corner so i can't see the screen completely. I figured out a way to fix temporarily the problem but it is still quite annoying. I have to go to video settings and put it on full screen and then back to borderless and it fixes everything. I'm using a 1920 X 1080 resolution wich is my screen resolution.

Does anybody knows what i can do to solve the problem ? 

Thanks

replies.body:
You could run into trouble if you're using a 4K or exceeding 1920x1080.  Your settings are otherwise acting pretty erattic so I'm curious if your config settings are acting up.  Try performing a reset of your config to see if this does the trick:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

Let me know if it fixes the issue!

I did as you mentionned but the problem is still there. As I said, it's happening only when there are patches. So today, there was a mini patch on my league of legends and the problem happened. So I had to fix it the way I've been doing it for the past 8 month. So i went into setting and put it on fullscreen and then borderless to make it work as i want.

The problem is only happening in the loading screen and in the game itself. 

So if you have any other idea on how to fix this i would appreciate :D If it has any effect i just reseted my windows lately and the problem is still going on.

Thanks for following up, even though it sucks that the issue persists.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can help individually.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to grab some logs and attach it to your ticket.  We'll get back to you!
